comments:
Build 2.1 M3

Maybe a consequence of bug 26748.

After bug 26748 occurred, I have closed/reopened my Java perspective, and open 
one file in editor. As soon as I typed in the editor, I saw an error dialog 
open, and noticed the following dump into the .log (likely what tagging the 
editor as dirty).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 26748 ***
